name: afrobarometer_langugages
title: The Afrobarometer Languages Dataset
description: This data links languages appearing in the Afrobarometer surveys to several language datasets: ISO 369-3, Glottolog, and the World Atlas of Language Structures (WALS).

name: Afrobarometer Merged Round 5 data (34 countries) (2011-2013) (last update: July 2015)
Afrobarometer ISO 639-3 Complete Code Tables Set (2017-02-17)
The World Atlas of Language Structures Online
countries
title: Afrobarometer Countries
description: Countries appearing in each Afrobarometer round, and associated ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 (2-letter) country codes. These ISO country codes are used in the other datasets because, unlike the country variables in the Afrobarometer surveys, they are standard across rounds.

name: value
title: Country value
description: The integer value of the Afrobarometer country variable. See the `afrobarometer_variables` table for the name of the country variable in each Afrobarometer round.

name: label
title: Country label
description: The label of the Afrobarometer country variable. See the `afrobarometer_variables` table for the name of the country variable in each Afrobarometer round.

name: iso_alpha2
label: Country code
description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

name: language_variables
description:
Names and information of language variables in the Afrobarometer survey.
This presents some of the information in `afrobarometer_languages` in a slightly different way.

name: type
label: Language variable type
description:
Language variable type.
- `respondent`: Respondent's home language. - `interview`: Interview language was conducted in. - `interviewer`: Interviewer's home language.

name: other

description: Variable with the verbatim responses to the "Other" option.

name: country
label: Country code
description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

name: name
label: Language name
description: Language name. This is the string value as it appears in an Afrobarometer language variable.

name: iso_639_3
label: ISO 639-3 codes
description: One or more ISO 639-3 language codes for that language. If a macrolanguage, then at most one. There should be no missing values, instead special ISO 639-3 codes are used.

name: glottocode
label: Glottocode codes
description: A Glottolog languoid identifier for the language. A (name, country) combination can match at most one Glottolog languoid, which can be a family, language, or dialect.

name: wals
label: WALS codes
description: One or more language identifiers for languages in the World Atlas of Language Structures (WALS).
